modName: Skyrim Backpacks- Realistic weight carrying-update new retex
summary: Ever wondered where the hell does your character hide all his items? Like potions and stuff?
descriptionHtml:
I planed adding 4-5 backpacks each one would extend your weight carrying skill from 50 to 150/200/300/400 first one would be free other ones would cost at least a couple thousands coins 

Info about the current stage:
Makes the game a bit more realistic. It\'s only a decorative element. Mainy for mages and warriors. 
It is highly recomended for all you guys to regulate the distance of the backpack according to your own preferences, i think that the fastest way you can do this is by using nifskope. The small one is located in the guardhouse wardrobe, while the bigger one in breezehome.



I will retexture them soon, now it\'s just a vanilla bag replacing the quiver
(WARNING:don\'t use the bow while carrying)
author: legendarny ziom
